Articles.Content:
KSP Engineers,

I was just thinking that my G510 Keyboard and my G13 keypad (or any other G series devices), would be tremendously most triumphant, if the LCD screens had information on them to give me more room on the screen. That and the immersion of multiple input devices does give you that felling that you are operating a very advance piece of hardware. Anyone else have the same idea or any inputs?
There is a mod that added some functionality for it: GHud. Would be nice to see better support in stock, but it's probably not a high priority for the devs at this point.
